battleships_model

Class Battleships_Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleships_model.Battleships_Model

  • public class Battleships_Model
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Model class in which all the methods of handling the data of the game is carried out
    Author:
    Abdassami Alvi

    • Method Detail

      • initialiseGame

        public void initialiseGame(int[][] board,
                  int player)
        method of type void to clear an entire board to a 0 value which means it is water
        Parameters:
        board - is the specific board in need of updating
        player - is the specific player for which the board is needed for an update

      • randomizeGame

        public void randomizeGame(int[][] board,
                 int player)
        method of type void for radomizing the ship placement it will randomally choose a spot on the board and checks whether the length of the ship will go out of bounds if so then randomally choose another spot till the latter is false it then updates the board so that a valid area is occupied by a ship this is done till all the ships are placed
        Parameters:
        board - is the specific player board to be passed in
        player - is the specific player of the board that needs updating

      • placeShip

        public void placeShip(int[][] board,
             int player)
        method of type void to place a ship it will change the values that have been highlighted to an occupied value
        Parameters:
        board - is the specific player grid
        player - is the specific player for which the ship is being placed for

      • shoot

        public int shoot(java.lang.String coordinate,
        int shots,
        int[][] board)
        method of type int to change a selected coordinate to a miss or a hit it checks whether that coordinate is occupied and updates the board value according to the result
        Parameters:
        coordinate - is the specific coordinate passed in for updating
        shots - is the current amount of shots for a specific player
        board - is the specific board which is in need of updating
        Returns:
        the up to date value of shots

      • shipSunk

        public boolean shipSunk()
        method of type boolean to check whether a ship has been sunk or not
        Returns:
        the result

        Returns:

      • highlight

        public boolean highlight(java.lang.String coordinate,
                int size,
                int[][] board)
        method of type boolean to highlight the buttons on the grid it will highlight the amount for the length of a chosen ship it will reverse the highlight if the mouse moves out of bound of a specified area
        Parameters:
        coordinate - is the first coordinate and reference for highlighting the grid
        size - is the length of a chosen ship
        board - is the specific board on which to highlight
        Returns:
        whether a highlighted area would be a valid placement or not

      • removeHighlight

        public void removeHighlight(int[][] board)
        method of type void to remove any current highlights from the grid
        Parameters:
        board - is passed as a players grid

      • aI

        public int aI(int[][] board,
     int cpuShots)
        method of type int to implement to computer playing function the AI randomly selects a coordinate on the player map and strategically shoots the board if it has found a ship
        Parameters:
        board - is passed in as the players grid
        cpuShots - is passed in to keep count of how many hits the cpu has made
        Returns:
        an up to date value of cpuShots
